name: Call Introduction
desc: The first 5 - 30 seconds of the call, the customer is greeted and verified.

name: Process & Procedure
desc: The bulk of the call; depending on the customer's issue it will be resolved or a follow-up expectation is set.

name: Soft Skills
desc: Crtieria used throughout the call to establish a unified company voice.

name: Close of Call
desc: The 30 - 60 seconds of the call, issue/resolution is summarized and the customer leaves the call knowing what comes next.
